item.title: Rounded Feature Blocks
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row gap="20" equal_height="yes"][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1482329347065{background-color: #33b8e0 !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}"][vc_icon type="material" icon_material="vc-material vc-material-devices_other" color="white" background_style="rounded" background_color="custom" size="lg" align="center" custom_background_color="#f2d357"][vc_custom_heading text="Multiple Devices" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1482329492136{padding-right: 35px !important;padding-left: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1482329614784{padding-right: 35px !important;padding-left: 35px !important;}"]

Gadgets in particular are small tools powered by electronic principles.

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title="Learn More" style="outline" shape="round" color="white" align="center" css=".vc_custom_1482329450488{padding-bottom: 35px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1482329407253{background-color: #3199d6 !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}"][vc_icon type="material" icon_material="vc-material vc-material-headset_mic" color="white" background_style="rounded" background_color="custom" size="lg" align="center" custom_background_color="#f2d357"][vc_custom_heading text="Online Support" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1482329537002{padding-right: 35px !important;padding-left: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1482329664982{padding-right: 35px !important;padding-left: 35px !important;}"]

Most companies offer technical support for the products they sell.

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title="Learn More" style="outline" shape="round" color="white" align="center" css=".vc_custom_1482329450488{padding-bottom: 35px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1482329398264{background-color: #33b8e0 !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}"][vc_icon type="material" icon_material="vc-material vc-material-mail_outline" color="white" background_style="rounded" background_color="custom" size="lg" align="center" custom_background_color="#f2d357"][vc_custom_heading text="Newsletter" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1482329588549{padding-right: 35px !important;padding-left: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1482329696337{padding-right: 35px !important;padding-left: 35px !important;}"]

A newsletter is a regularly distributed publication about one topic.

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title="Learn More" style="outline" shape="round" color="white" align="center" css=".vc_custom_1482329450488{padding-bottom: 35px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]
